title: New Announcement System!
message:
This is a NEW announcment system! I can edit this whenever without even touching the serverside code!

Some more news, We have a partner! VORTEX is our first partner, which you can see in the brand new PARTNER page! Just click the hand shaking button at the top, bam!

We also have a KoFi now! If you dont know what Kofi is, it's like a patreon! There's exclusive roles and stuff if you donate or become a monthly member.

With that, we get some bug fixes! The 404 page now takes you to kugelfoods.com and not crownprincehospital anymore!
